titles.title: PASS Act of 2018
A bill to revise the amounts for discretionary Federal Pell Grant funding, and for other purposes.
PASS Act of 2018
Promoting Academic Success Sustainably Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Promoting Academic Success Sustainably Act of 2018 or the PASS Act of 2018
This bill amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to decrease the maximum amount of Pell Grant awards that students may receive each year.
